Headline: #79 79th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 79th/Albany
ShortDescription: Westbound 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Western Terminal, 71st, Kedzie, and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Albany.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Western Terminal, 71st, Kedzie, and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Albany.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 35th/Archer. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at 35th/Archer.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
